featured.text: According to the passage, what may be the author’s advice to a doctor before a surgery? (A) To provide the patient with more pain killers.
Many people think these bug killers or pesticides will penetrate every place where the insects hide.
It’s a killer for sure if eaten regularly.

definition.en_def: A person or thing that kills; someone who intentionally causes the death of another.
definition.example: The detective was on the hunt for the elusive killer.
